SMW Subobject for The Eyes of GlouphrieNPC location: Tree Gnome StrongholdUses infobox: NPCNPC ID: 4914Examine: Small but wise, he is.Release date: 15 August 2006Image: File:Brimstail.pngIs members only: trueIs variant of: Brimstail

Brimstail is a gnome wizard that lives in a small cave in the south-west part of Tree Gnome Stronghold, near the river. He can teleport a player to the Rune essence mine if they have completed Rune Mysteries.

Brimstail is one of the few gnomes that uses magic. He dabbles in the gnomish art of illusionment spells, and is actually in possession of the machine that Oaknock used to prove the death of Argento the spirit tree.

Brimstail plays a large role in The Eyes of Glouphrie quest. With the aid of an adventurer, he manages to rebuild the ancient disillusionment machine and proves the existence of evil creatures within the stronghold itself. Had Brimstail not pursued his wish to reconstruct the machine, the stronghold may have fallen to the gnomes of Arposandra.

He is also a potential customer in the Gnome Restaurant minigame if done on the easy option.

Having Brimstail teleport you to the Essence mine is a requirement for the Easy Western Provinces Diary.

  • 2 Dialogue

Treasure Trails[edit | edit source]

Brimstail is the solution to the medium anagram clue: BAIL TRIMS.

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • The examine text is possibly a reference to Yoda from the Star Wars franchise, who was small, wise, and talked using syntax similar to the examine text.

{{External|rs|rsc}} {{Infobox NPC |version1 = Normal |version2 = The Eyes of Glouphrie |name = Brimstail |image = [[File:Brimstail.png|150px]] |release1 = [[12 December]] [[2002]] |release2 = [[15 August]] [[2006]] |update1 = Agility skill online |update2 = The Eyes of Glouphrie |members = Yes |race = [[Gnome]] |quest = [[The Eyes of Glouphrie]] |location = [[Tree Gnome Stronghold]] |gender = Male |options1 = Talk-to, Teleport |options2 = None |examine = Small but wise, he is. |map = {{Map|name=Brimstail|x=2409|y=9817|r=2|mapID=19|mtype=square}} |id1 = 4913 |id2 = 4914 }} [[File:Brimstail chathead.png|left]] '''Brimstail''' is a [[gnome]] wizard that lives in a [[Brimstail's cave|small cave]] in the south-west part of [[Tree Gnome Stronghold]], near the river. He can teleport a player to the [[Rune essence mine]] if they have completed [[Rune Mysteries]]. Brimstail is one of the few gnomes that uses [[magic]]. He dabbles in the gnomish art of illusionment spells, and is actually in possession of the machine that [[Oaknock the Engineer|Oaknock]] used to prove the death of [[Argento]] the [[spirit tree]]. Brimstail plays a large role in [[The Eyes of Glouphrie]] quest. With the aid of an adventurer, he manages to rebuild the ancient disillusionment machine and proves the existence of [[evil creature]]s within the stronghold itself. Had Brimstail not pursued his wish to reconstruct the machine, the stronghold may have fallen to the gnomes of [[Arposandra]]. He is also a potential customer in the [[Gnome Restaurant]] [[minigame]] if done on the easy option. Having Brimstail teleport you to the [[Essence mine]] is a requirement for the [[Easy Western Provinces Diary]]. ==Treasure Trails== {{Anagram|Brimstail|medium|BAIL TRIMS}}. ==Dialogue== {{hastranscript|NPC}} ==Changes== ===Gallery (historical)=== {|style="text-align: center" cellpadding="15" |[[File:Brimstail (historical).png|center|300x150px]] |[[File:Brimstail.png|center|300x150px]] |- |[[File:Brimstail chathead (historical).png|center]] |[[File:Brimstail chathead.png|center]] |- |29 March 2004 –
